_header: Thou wisdom that creepedest out of Gods mouth
_description: Translation of the Advent antiphon, O Sapientia — two couplets in a Latin prose sermon

WorcF126.Transcription:
Þu wysdom þat crepedest out of Godes mouþeþat
                    rechest frame est to west, fram norþ to souþþat alle
                    þynges mades throw þy mythcome to tech vs þe wey of
                    flyth
